name: Doombox
description:
Highly recommend playing the downloadable version; includes saves and better performance

Beat the level to earn credits

Use your credits to buy upgrades

W A S D Controls

Aim with Mouse

Use your new upgrades to beat the game faster and earn MORE credits

Make sure to avoid obstacles or you will PAY THE PRICE

Made for Juice Jam II
